sqoop.arg: SELECT LkInvIsolatedReasonMSTID,InvIsolatedReasonID,MachineStageTypeID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo._SP_LkInvIsolatedReasonMST WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AcquisitionChainID,AcquisitionChain,Description, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionChain WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT AcquisitionVariantID,FromDT,ToDT,DataEntryURI,SPCURI,AcquisitionImageURI,LoginID,ModifiedDT,Comments,Instructions,PartID,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,ToolTypeID,NoCavities,Documents,IsSuspendable,IsRotatableStepPlan,EBAReference,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AcquisitionVariant_ WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ActionTypeID,ActionType,Description,ActionTypeCode,ReportOrder,Format, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ActionType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AssetLevelID,AssetID,SubAssetID,Sequence,Comments,FromDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.AssetLevel WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT PartID,ParentPartID,SubPartID,BOMItemID,SubPartQuantityTotal,SubPartUnitID,RfInvPackTraceabilityID,Lvl,SortOrder,SubPartQuantity,BOMVariantID,Instructions,RfBOMItemTypeID,IsAllowExceedBOMQty, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.BOMExplosion WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT CommonFaultID,CommonFault,Description,LineTypeID,MachineStageTypeID,ToolTypeID,GaugeTypeID,PartTypeID,RfAssetTypeID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CommonFault WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT CrnAdapterID,Length,ModifiedDT, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.CrnAdapter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT id,objectid,property,value,uvalue,lvalue,version, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.dtproperties WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT IndividualDefectID,PartInstanceID,Ignored,DefectCount,MeasurementSetID,AttributeTypeID,ProductID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.IndividualDefect WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT LineGroupID,LineGroup,LineGroupCode,Description,OEETarget,WasteTarget,Reference1,Reference2,Reference3,Reference4,Reference5, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LineGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT AttributeTypeGroupID,AttributeTypeID,LkATATGID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkATATG WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCChartSetID,SPCChartDefID,Sequence,LkCSetCDefID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LKCSetCDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkDocumentWIStepID,WorkInstructionStepID,DocumentID, 3 as "org_id", 'SPDV' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkDocumentWIStep WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkMachineStagePrinterID,MachineStageID,PrinterID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkMachineStagePrinter WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartTypeID,OperationTypeID,IsInventoryCarriedOver,LkOpTPartTConsumedID, 5 as "org_id", 'SPTM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkOpTPartTConsumed WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCCalcStyleID,RfViolationRuleID,RfChartComponentID,LkSPCCSVRID,RuleRange,RuleGroup, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkSPCCSVR WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT LkUCTGUCTID,UnitCountTypeGroupID,UnitCountTypeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.LkUCTGUCT WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStageCellID,MachineStageID,IsCreator,IsConsumer,IsLabeller,IsAutoBatchNo,IsPackConsumer,IsResortConsumer,IsNonJob,IsToolShowCavities,IsInvPackPackNo,IsInvPackPartNo,IsInvPackPartDesc,IsInvPackPartType,IsInvPackQty,IsInvPackHeader,IsInvPackRows,IsInvPackState,IsInvPackReason,IsAcqDblck,AcqGrid,CustomPage,IsClickable,IsDrillable, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStageCell WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MachineStopReasonID,StopReason,Description,MachineStageTypeID,IsPlanned,StopCode,RfMachineStopClassID,RfLineStopReasonTypeID,MachineStopCategoryID,IsRetired, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MachineStopReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedure,PartID,ResponsibleDepartmentID,BudgetWorkDone,PlannedManHours,PlannedDuration,MaintenanceProcedureCode,AdvanceWarningPeriod,SchedulingWindow,PlannedMachineStageDowntime,PlannedLineDowntime,SubPartID,CreatedDT,CreatedLoginID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,CostCentreID,IsAutoAuthoriseWork,IsRetired,IsToolTakenOutOfService, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceProcedure WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT MaintenanceWorkID,MaintenanceWO,AssetID,MaintenanceProcedureID,MaintenanceProcedureRevisionID,MaintProcScheduleOnAssetID,RfMaintenanceWorkTypeID,AdhocWorkToDo,MaintProcScheduleOnAssetNo,MaintenanceWorkStatusID,ActualStartDT,ActualEndDT,ActualManHours,PlannedStartDT,PlannedEndDT,PlannedManHours,OwnerLoginID,ActualLabourCost,PlannedLabourCost,RfCurrencyID,PartsCost,LineDownCost,Priority,MaintenanceReasonID,IsPlannedDateLockedByUser,EBATriggerID,PeriodDueDT,RunHoursDueDT,PartsBasedDueDT,EventDueDT,ReleasedDT,ReleasedLoginID,IsEdited,RevisionNo,AbsoluteCounterThreshold, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.MaintenanceWork WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SerialNo,TimePacked,IMS_No, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ModulePackedDateTime WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT OPCGroupID,Deadband,UpdateRate,OPCGroup,IsActive,RfGroupNotifyModeID,TimeBias,OPCServerID,IsPublic,LocalID,CacheUpdateRate, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT OPCServerID,OPCClientID,OPCServer,ProgID,IsActive,ComputerID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.OPCServer WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT PartSubClassificationID,PartSubClassification,PartClassificationID, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM dbo.PartSubClassification WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ProductTypeID,Name,ProductTypeCode,Variant1TagListID,Variant2TagListID,Variant3TagListID,Variant4TagListID,Variant5TagListID,Variant6TagListID,Variant7TagListID,Variant8TagListID,Variant9TagListID,Variant10TagListID,Variant11TagListID,Variant12TagListID,Variant13TagListID,Variant14TagListID,Variant15TagListID,Variant16TagListID,Variant17TagListID,Variant18TagListID,Variant19TagListID,Variant20TagListID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ProductType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ScrapReasonGroupID,ScrapReasonGroup,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ScrapReasonGroup WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ShiftPatternID,ShiftPattern,PatternDuration,IsPatternDirty,IsCustomPeriod, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ShiftPattern WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT SPCChartDefID,VariableTypeID,SPCRuleID,RfStudyTypeID,GroupingSize,MovingRange,SPCCalcStyleID,RfGroupingID,NGroupMarkerID,CpBasedOnID,CLBasedOnID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCChartDef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT SPCRuleID,SPCRule,TAGMSTYPE1ID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.SPCRule WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagListID,ListName,VariantNo, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagList WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT TagTreeNodeImgLocID,TagTreeNodeID,X,Y,Width,Height,MappedTagTreeNodeID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.TagTreeNodeImgLoc WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT ToolID,Tool,ToolSet,Description,ToolTypeID,IsRetired,NoCavities,Variant1,Variant2,Variant3,Variant4,Variant5,Variant6,Variant7,Variant8,Variant9,Variant10,Variant11,Variant12,Variant13,Variant14,Variant15,PartID,Variant16,Variant17,Variant18,Variant19,Variant20, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Tool WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT ToolChangeReasonID,ToolTypeID,ChangeReason,Description,ChangeToRfToolStatusID, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.ToolChangeReason WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT UnitID,Unit,Description, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.Unit WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT VariableTypeID,Name,ProductTypeID,Description,IsUnilateral,VariableTypeCode,IsProcessParameter,VariableTypeClassID,ImageURI, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.VariableType WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
SELECT WORefID,WOReference, 1 as "org_id", 'SPMX' as "org_name" FROM dbo.WORef WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )

SELECT Location.LocationID, Location.Location, Location.LocationTypeID, Location.IsRetired, Location.MaxQuantity, Location.LocationCode, Location.Description, LocationType.LocationType, LocationType.LocationTypeCode, 2 as "org_id", 'SPMM' as "org_name" FROM Location FULL JOIN LocationType ON (Location.LocationID = LocationType.LocationTypeID) WHERE ( $CONDITIONS )
